text:
e="preserve">Taryn Stephanie Power (September 13, 1953 – June 26, 2020) was an American actress. She was born in Los Angeles, California. Her career lasted from 1972 to 1990. Her parents were actors Tyrone Power and Linda Christian.
She acted in eight movies, the first two in Spanish. Her best known roles were as "Valentine De Villefort" in "The Count of Monte Cristo" (1975) and as "Dione" in "Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger" (1977).
Power died on June 26, 2020 at her home in Wisconsin from leukemia at the age of 66.

annotations.surface_form: Sinbad and the Eye of the Tiger
